name: A Vine Mazing
description:
A Vine Mazing is a 2 Button Game that mixes the classic Snake game with a Maze & puzzle style game.  Navigate through the maze & Get to the exit. 

Game features 6 levels with lots of room to go for a high score!

Much like snake, the longer your vine, the more points you get.  So feel free to take your time on completing a level!
